You may not need to be restricted to the Non-Citizen Spouse Scheme if you have a child with your foreign spouse. If the child is Singaporean or SPR  you can form a family nucleus (including your foreign spouse) with your Singaporean or SPR child and apply under the HDB Public Scheme which allows you to purchase BTOs that are larger than the 2-room flexi flats.

The maximum loan repayment period for HDB loans isÂ 65 yearsÂ minus buyer's age orÂ 30 years  whichever is shorter. The maximum loan repayment period for loans taken through financial institutions isÂ 35 years. 5. The maximum age at which the loan must be repaid isÂ 65 years oldÂ *.
